title: 【氵】【沙雕指令】一·键·崩·溃
author: 钻石ew666
txt_content:
自从我开始研究指令后...
氵帖的成本增加了
先是系统文件损坏
然后又把Java给boom了
获得成就：看电脑不爽
二话不说，上指令

/give @p minecraft:creeper_spawn_egg{display:{Lore:["{"text":"坑人哦~","color":"red","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false,"strikethrough":false,"obfuscated":false}"]},Unbreakable:1,Enchantments:[{}],EntityTag:{DeathLootTable:"entities/empty",Effects:[{Id:4,Amplifier:254,Duration:200},{Id:2,Amplifier:254,Duration:200},{Id:9,Amplifier:254,Duration:200},{Id:7,Amplifier:254,Duration:200},{Id:15,Amplifier:254,Duration:200},{Id:17,Amplifier:254,Duration:200},{Id:18,Amplifier:254,Duration:200},{Id:19,Amplifier:254,Duration:200},{Id:20,Amplifier:254,Duration:200},{Id:27,Amplifier:254,Duration:200}],Age:0,Duration:1200,Particle:hugeexplosion,Color:1879022,Radius:30,RadiusOnUse:30,RadiusPerTick:30,id:"minecraft:area_effect_cloud"}} 1复制代码



版本：1.14+
